## UNIST seminar

![UNIST Seminar 1](images/unist_01.jpeg)
![UNIST Seminar 2](images/unist_02.jpeg)
![UNIST Seminar 3](images/unist_03.jpeg)

**Date: 05AUG2025**

Thanks to the invitation of Professor Sang Il Seok of UNIST, I visited Ulsan to share recent research results on AI for materials science and discuss future directions for collaboration.
